name: TubeRush - Multiplayer infinite runner
description:
TubeRush is the olympic challenge for though runners that are not afraid of challenges!
Prove yourself to be the best runner in the world by competing in the Tubolympic Tournament!

Game types:
*Single player - Infinite runner
*Multiplayer - Compete with your friend in real time, use Abilities to win the race
*Private tournament - Play with all your friends
*Public tournament - Play in the world's biggest tournaments

The championship takes place in the dangerous tube tunnels of
*London
*Moscow
*Paris
*New York
*Beijing

Choose from 6 dextrous & courageous athletes that are ready to compete in the Tubolympics to claim the ultimate prize!!
*Volt: the lightning fast American runner.
*Rena: comes from Brazil ready to prove best.
*Zee: the Chinese athete that trained with monks to become fast & agile.
*Nica: comes from Russia, she's tough and ready for every challenge.
*Stun: the punky runner that never stopped, even after a terrible accident.
*Floyd: proved his strength in Nigeria and now he comes to be the champion.
